---

<p>You may recall that we gave away a few Seeed Studio Grove Modules a couple
  weeks <a href="http://mbed.org/blog/entry/Free-Stuff---Seeedstudio-Modules/">back</a>.</p>
<p>
  <img width="200" alt="Seeed Studio" title="Seeed Studio" src="data:image/png;base64,">
</p>
<p>The mbed users that we gave the modules to, have kindly shared these libraries
  - so check them out if you are looking for sensors to use in your next
  project</p>
<p><span><span class="authortext"><a href="/users/NickRyder/"><img alt="" class="icon" src="data:image/png;base64,"></a> <a href="/users/NickRyder/"> Nick Ryder</a></span></span>,
  has written up a cookbook page for the <a href="/cookbook/Seeed-grove-ultrasonic-ranger">Ultrasonic Range Finder</a>.</p>
<table>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <img alt="Ultrasonic Ranger" title="Ultrasonic Ranger" src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>

  has written up a cookbook page for the <a href="/cookbook/Grove-3-axis-Accelerometer">Grove 3-axis Accelerometer</a>.</p>
